title: Handle Account Takeover Suspicion
description: The system detects a suspicious login to a rider's account from a new device in a different country, followed by a trip request.

tasks.description: The system's fraud detection engine flags a suspicious login and immediately puts a temporary hold on the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The account is frozen to prevent fraudulent activity.

tasks.description: An automated email and push notification are sent to the registered owner of the account, alerting them to the suspicious activity and prompting a password reset.
Any active trip requests from the suspicious session are automatically cancelled.
